Description: 2015 Gibson Les Paul Traditional Limited Edition for the Japan Market (made in the USA of course),weighs in at 9.10, basically its like a classic with 1959 appointments ,Excellent + with very little wear maybe a tiny mark here or there was played very little gently at home, blank truss rod cover, 59 body contour shape, no weight relief, slim taper neck, AA top, cherry sunburst , super 59 pickups, bone nut, fret over binding, no push pulls, classic neck width not the newer wide, no hologram, Very loud acoustically when played not thru an amp, notes ring thru the body, it came with g force tuners and were taken off and vintage tuners were installed buy a pro and no the g force tuners are not included, comes with case and candy, low action, do not miss this they are very hard to find, 48 state USA shipping only ,look up the info on these they are a hidden gem, if you ever wanted a affordable 59 here it is , These were made for the japan market (yamano) factory line 59s instead custom shops that cost 6000$.
Title: 2015 Gibson Les Paul Japan Limited Edition Traditional, with 1959 specs RARE
ConditionDescription: excellent condition 9 out of 10 , played gently at home, could be very minor wear as in a tiny mark here or there
